Description.Text: TheHeart Serviced Apartments are at the centre of MediaCityUK, within the Salford Quays area. Offering Hotel-Style Apartment Living, styled to appeal to both the business and leisure traveler alike, guests can enjoy hotel-style accommodation, with the flexibility of apartment living. The property has 50 fully equipped and beautifully furnished self-contained apartments, all connected to the complimentary Wi-Fi. Many of the apartments also offer amazing views across The Quays and towards Manchester City Centre. TheHeart Apartments offer the ideal short-term accommodation solution, whether it is a weekend stay or temporary home during your relocation, TheHeart offers more space and greater flexibility with the comforts of a home from home. With no minimum stay contract there is greater choice for you to shape the term of your stay to meet your needs. The spacious serviced apartments, with a choice of studio, 1, 2 or 3 bedrooms, are the perfect alternative for those who would like the benefits of a hotel stay combined with the space and flexibility that an apartment brings. Enjoy the freedom to come and go as you please and cook meals in your very own fully equipped kitchen. For your convenience the property operates a dry cleaning service and housekeeping service. All apartments come with a fully equipped kitchen and the open-plan living design provides light and airy living and dining areas with the added benefit of balconies in many apartments. All apartments offer: White high gloss kitchen, integrated kitchen appliances (Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer, Microwave, Oven, Hob and Fridge/Freezer), Luxurious toiletries, Hairdryer, Luxury Egyptian cotton bed linen & toweling, Complimentary Wi-Fi and Flat screen TV with Freeview in lounge areas. PLEASE NOTE: CHECK IN IS BETWEEN 3PM AND 10PM DAILY (RECEPTION IS CLOSED AFTER 10PM)

You'll find the hotel easily, just 2 minutes from the M60 and M62 motorways and 11 miles from Manchester International Airport. The Heart Serviced Apartments are minutes from Old Trafford for Manchester United matches and a 5-minute walk from The Lowry Arts Theatre, Imperial War Museum North and Lowry Outlet Mall. Hop on the Metro link tram outside MediaCityUK to be at central Manchester Piccadilly rail station in 10 minutes, a short walk from the bohemian Northern Quarter and Arndale Centre. Designer shopping is on offer at the award winning shopping and leisure complex The Trafford Centre, 10 minutes' drive away.

Studio Apartment - There are 12 non-smoking studio apartments available accommodating three people sharing. Studios offer one double bed, bathroom, fully fitted kitchen with washing machine, dishwasher, cooker, microwave, toaster, fridge freezer, hairdryer, free Wi Fi and TV.
Studio Plus Apartment - There are five non-smoking studio plus apartments available accommodating 2 people sharing. Studio Plus Apartments offer one double bed, bathroom, fully fitted kitchen with washing machine, dishwasher, cooker, microwave, toaster, fridge freezer, hairdryer, free WiFi and TV.
One Bedroom Apartment - There are nine non-smoking One Bed Apartments available accommodating 2 persons. One Bed Apartments offer one double bedroom, bathroom, fully fitted kitchen with washing machine, dishwasher, cooker, microwave, toaster, fridge freezer, hairdryer, free WiFi, TV and seating area.
Two Bedroom Apartment - There are five non-smoking Two Bed Apartments accommodating 3 people (one double bed with ensuite bathroom and one single bedroom). Two Bed Apartments offer one double bed with en-suite bathroom and one single bedroom, bathroom, fully fitted kitchen with washing machine, dishwasher, cooker, microwave, toaster, fridge freezer, hairdryer, free WiFi and TV. The living room has a sofa, dining table and chairs and TV.
Two Bedroom Premium Deluxe Apartment - There are 14 non-smoking two bed Premium Deluxe Apartments accommodating 4 people (two double bedrooms, one double bedroom with ensuite bathroom). Two bed Premium Deluxe offers a double bed in both bedrooms; one of the double bedroom offers ensuite facilities; bathroom, fully fitted kitchen with washing machine, dishwasher, cooker, microwave, toaster, fridge freezer, hairdryer, free Wi-Fi and TV. The lounge area has a sofa, dining table and chairs and TV.
Three Bedroom Apartment - There are five non-smoking 3 Bed Premium Deluxe Apartments accommodating 5 people (two double bedrooms, one with ensuite, and one single bedroom). Three bed Premium Deluxe Apartments offer a double bed in 2 bedrooms, and a single bed in the 3rd bedroom. Bathroom, fully fitted kitchen with washing machine, dishwasher, cooker, microwave, toaster, fridge freezer, hairdryer, free Wi-Fi and TV. The lounge area has a sofa, dining table and chairs and TV.
